metadata.synopsis: An attack beast used to mistreatment stands guard with its masters. Fearful, vengeful beast.

0.speaker: Small Klaw
0.text: Good smell. Pack smell. Smell like papa. Papa?
0.context: NodeContext: Sniffing at the shit on your face. Quick, primal - as if looking for comfort.

1.speaker: Small Klaw
1.text: Touch me 'n I'll bleed ye out.
1.context: NodeContext: A seething whisper. Used to being mistreated
